Package node

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentStarter
    The class that starts up the agents.
    CheckFolderThread
    The Thread to check if there are new files on the system.
    FailureThread
    The Thread that checks if the next node is still reachable. it pings every 10s to the next node and when the node doesn't reply runs the failure sequence.
    FileFiche
    The representation of a file in the system Y.
    FileList
    The object that is used by the agent to update the nodes with the files in the system.
    FileListAgent
    The agent that passes the file list to all the nodes.
    FileRecoveryAgent  
    Main
    The static class used to run the node side of the project.
    MulticastClient
    Send username over the multicast and start running the listen on multicast thread.
    MulticastRecieveThread
    The thread that listens for multicast messages and handles accordingly.
    Node  
    ReceiveUDPThread
    The class that receives udp messages and handles accordingly.
    SendFileThread
    Send list of files to the right owner.
    SocketHandler
    Maintain all socket information
    StartupThread
    Startup the basics for running the node.
    TCPReceive
    The method to receive data over TCP.
    TCPSend
    Send a file over TCP
